hackathon-description-text: MAHacks is a bi-annual hackathon in Boston, run for high schoolers, by high schoolers. We believe in sustainable, long-term projects that solve community problems. We want your hacks to grow beyond our events and create real impact, and we'll help you get there.
hackathon-eligibility:
High school students (middle school students are allowed on a case-by-case basis)
Individuals or teams (2-4 members)
hackathon-rules:
Be nice! For guidelines, please see the 
.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: SPRINT Session with the Innovation & Digital Health Accelerator at Boston Children's Hospital
Long-Term Mentorship With an Expert in the Education Field

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=133 Portland St, Boston, MA 02114, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion:
Have a mix of technical skill and entrepreneurial foresight.

More to come.
